issues.title: Gun Violence Prevention
issues.description: Strong supporter of comprehensive gun control measures, including universal background checks and assault weapons ban

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding the Affordable Care Act, lowering prescription drug prices, and protecting pre-existing condition coverage

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for Green New Deal principles, supports significant investment in renewable energy and emissions reduction

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for public education, student debt relief, and expanding access to community colleges

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship, opposes border wall, advocates for DACA protections

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports protecting abortion access and opposing restrictions on reproductive healthcare

issues.title: Economic Equality
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, strengthening labor unions, and reducing income inequality
